casebody.data:
Hilda Berger et al., Doing Business as J. B. Express Company, as Successors in Interest to Louis Berger, Deceased, et al., Doing Business as J. B. Express Co. v. 34th Street Garage, Inc.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. 'Settle order on notice. Concur — Botein, J. P., Rabin, Frank, Valente and Bergan, JJ. [See 2 A D 2d 972.]
